## What are Factors

- R's representation for categorical data
- Can be nominal or ordinal
- Built on integer
- Have levels

## Nominal Factor {.scrollable}
- Have no rank or degree of order

## Ordinal Factor {.scrollable}
- They have ranks and order
- The difference between the values are not equal
